revision.comment: Omega moved page [[C.H.I.P.]] to [[Next Thing C.H.I.P.]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Next Thing |model=C.H.I.P. |price=9 |est_release_date=June 2016 |fcc_date=12/17/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Discontinued |type=single-board computer |fcc_id=2AF9F-HELLA1337 |ic_id=20863-HELLA1337 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=R8 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H27UCG8T2ETR |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646Q-HYK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=RF-LINK RL-SM02BD |wi1_module_if=SDIO/UART |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8723BS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=integrated |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Power Management IC;X-Powers;AXP209;;1;,,, Remote 8-bit I/O Expander for I2C Bus;Texas Instruments;PCF8574A;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.0 LE, composite AV, GPIO, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2016.01 |stock_os=Linux;.4.4.13;Debian |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_user=chip |default_pass=chip |oui=A0:2C:36 }} {{TagLine|Development Board}}
[https://getchip.com/pages/chip Product page]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/05/08/chip-is-a-9-linux-development-board-powered-by-allwinner-r8-crowdfunding/ ''CHIP is a $9 Linux Development Board Powered by Allwinner R8'' on '''CNXSOFT''' News] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/NextThingCo_CHIP ''NextThingCo CHIP'' on '''sunxi''' Wiki] *[http://www.chip-community.org/index.php/Main_Page Community Wiki] *[https://github.com/NextThingCo/ ''Next Thing Co'' on '''GitHub''' Source Code]
Example used for this entry has 8 GB Flash, but most earlier examples only have 4GB.
